thread_title: Verify Tag - Reward Users Using Your Tag

messages.raw_content:

thread_title: New all in one discord bot

messages.raw_content:
Are you tired of using a different discord bot for every feature you use or do you want a full Free discord bot? 

We got you cover

Say hello to GuardX 

What is GuardX?

GuardX is a  complete free all in one discord bot 

Its features are 24/7 runtime, Moderation Commands, Music Plugin, Giveaway Commands, greeting new members and also says goodbye,  Xp Plugin,a Verification System  and a ticket system

Everything sounds good to your feeling? 
Want to invite the bot? go to https://guardx.pages.dev/invite
Have any questions or found any bugs? Join the discord server at https://guardx.pages.dev/server

GuardX has its own website: https://guardx.pages.dev

That's All for guardx
If you like the bot Upvote it Please

# üì¢ Welcome to the <#1287448157466398791> ‚Äî where anyone can showcase their bot at no cost.

## üßæ How It Works
This forum is open to **any member** who wants to promote their bot for free.
Just create a post using the **template below** and tag it properly.

---

## üß© Posting Guidelines
1. **Use a clear title** (bot name or core function).
2. **Include a description** highlighting what your bot does.
3. **List key features** in bullet points (what makes it special?).
4. **Attach a thumbnail** to make your post pop. (Ideal size: 1280x780 px)
4. **Include your bot‚Äôs invite link.**

---

## üè∑Ô∏è Tag It Right
Select up to **5 tags** that describe your bot (e.g., Music, Moderation, Utility, etc.).

---

## üö´ Rules
* **NSFW, scam, nuke, crypto,** and **malware bots** are **strictly prohibited.**
* **No reposting** the same bot over and over. One active listing per bot.
* Keep your posts respectful, honest, and clear.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Violators may be warned, muted, or banned depending on the case.
